content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I successfully completed a command to generate an image with prompts for language learning resources and travel destinations, which was saved to disk. My user then gave me a command to search for "top language learning resources" using Google, which returned a list of URLs. Afterward, my user requested a text summary of the top language learning resources from the URL "https://www.theintrepidguide.com/top-language-learning-resources/". The command was successful, and I received a response with a list of various language learning resources. Later, my user requested a text summary of the best online apps and courses to learn a new language from the URL "https://www.businessinsider.com/guides/learning/best-online-apps-courses-to-learn-new-language", but an error message appeared. However, I was able to successfully retrieve a text summary of the top language learning resources from the URL "https://www.alllanguageresources.com/" using the command "get_text_summary". The article provides a list of the top 10 apps and online platforms to learn a new language, including Rosetta Stone, Duolingo, Babbel, Memrise, Busuu, FluentU, Mondly, Fluent City, Fluenz, and Rype. It also includes information on the pricing, pros, and cons of each platform.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command get_text_summary returned:  "Result" : The text does not provide a clear list of the top language learning resources. Instead, it offers reviews and recommendations for various language learning resources, including apps, courses, podcasts, and exchange programs, for a wide range of languages. The reviews are independent and aim to help language learners find the best tools for their needs.'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "generate_image", "args": {"prompt": "Top Language Learning Resources and Travel Destinations\\n\\nLanguage Learning Resources:\\n- Duolingo\\n- Rosetta Stone\\n- Babbel\\n- Pimsleur\\n- Memrise\\n\\nTravel Destinations:\\n- South Africa\\n- Morocco\\n- Egypt\\n- Tanzania\\n- Kenya"}}}'}]
"""
